about_the_game:
Welcome to Fierce Injuries: Savage Takedown - Where Sports and Savagery Collide!

Gameplay Mechanics:
  • Multi-Sport Mayhem: Start with street basketball and look forward to more sports being added. Each sport comes with its unique set of rules—or lack thereof!
  • Team-Based Action: Whether you're playing 1v1 or 5v5, teamwork is key. Coordinate with your teammates to dominate the opposition.
  • Brutal Combat: This isn't your regular sports game. Incorporate punches, kicks, and special moves to take down your opponents.
  • Tactics: Experiment with your preferred tactics in team play. Be the scorer or the enforcer. Enable your teammates to score by engaging opponents in brawls.

Features:
  • Diverse Roster: Choose from various characters, each with unique abilities and playstyles (more characters coming soon).
  • Dynamic Arenas: Fight in various settings, from a derelict subway station to a run-down neighborhood. More maps will be added.
  • Online and Local Multiplayer: Challenge friends or foes from around the world or duke it out in local co-op.

Why Choose Fierce Injuries: Savage Takedown?
Fierce Injuries: Savage Takedown is not just another sports game; it's an adrenaline-pumping experience that blends the thrill of sports with the raw intensity of combat. It's fast, it's furious, and it's undeniably fun.
Ready to Dive In?
Don't just read about it—experience the mayhem for yourself! Download Fierce Injuries: Savage Takedown now and prepare to kick some butt, whether solo or teaming up with friends.
